name: UnifiedAttribute
description: The universal attribute for the Seven Segment Display

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the display
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the display
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the display
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the display
default: 20.0

content.name: height
content.description:
the height of the display
default: 30.0

content.name: background
content.description:
the background colour of the display
default: {r:0.0, g:0.0, b:0.0, a:1.0}

content.name: glow
content.description:
the colour of the segments of the display when they are glowing
default: {r:0.78 g:0.78, b:0.78, a:1.0}

content.name: dim
content.description:
the colour of the segments of the display when they are not glowing
default: {r:0.1, g:0.1, b:0.1, a:1.0}
